reviewText: This DVD features the sexy college girls from the Voyeur Dorm web site over the last 2 or 3 years. Here the focus is on a bikini competition, often very skimpy bikinis. All the girls are good-looking and sexy, and some of them are gorgeous. In addition to the contest, there are lots of segments with the girls in other settings, such as at the beach, playing games, or just strolling around. Not the most polished, imaginative, or intimate DVD of this type, but it has a good variety to it. The Voyeur Dorm girls have no qualms about going around topless and often totally nude - other than at the bikini contest, they're one or the other most of the time. The image on the DVD is good and clear, and the camera-work is generally good, though a few scenes are a little frustrating with the camera zooming in or out too much, a bit jittery, etc. But overall it's quite well filmed, and thankfully has few annoying special effects thrown in, the production crew making the wise decision to just show these sexy girls in all their glory. All in all, lots of fun, especially if you've chatted with some of these girls on their web site as I have. It's almost like I'm visiting with some good friends - I wish!!
